title: POC Elicit Clarity are their lightest ever cycling sunglasses at 23 grams
content:
Weight weenies rejoice, the new POC Elicit Clarity sunglasses come in at just 23g for a full coverage design with trussed arms. The weight savings come from a lack of bridge across the top, and by removing material on the arms. Small trusses to maintain rigidity toward the front to keep the lens stable, but

The post POC Elicit Clarity are their lightest ever cycling sunglasses at 23 grams appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
